website_summaries.verdict: Zerex has kept marine engines going for decades with its classic green formula, and this inexpensive, versatile, coolant is still a worthwhile budget coolant and antifreeze combo to this day.
pros: Protects engine from rust and corrosion
Reduces risk of deposits in cooling system
Antifreeze works against freezing up to -34°F
cons: Zerex works across the board as a coolant and antifreeze, but it doesn’t feature bonus protections offered by competing products

customer_reviews.title: Quality coolant
customer_reviews.text: Just had the radiator swapped in my 03 Buick century and I had them use this fluid instead of “dexcool”. Temps are great and I’ve had no issues whatsoever! Price is great as well! Highly recommended. PS don’t mix different colors or types (ie dexcool) of coolant. If you are switching, flush the system first. Otherwise the coolant will gum/gel up and you’ll have some big problems.
customer_reviews.author: Mike P

customer_reviews.title: An Excellent Coolant
customer_reviews.text: I have two vehicles that still use the original green coolant. I've been using this brand successfully for years and years; haven't had to change a radiator or a water pump in vehicles that range from 17 to 20 years old. I flush the cooling system every three or four years.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Julia

customer_reviews.title: Ordered 50/50 Received Regular
customer_reviews.text: I am disabled and it is a real hassle to find someone to mix this but it is not worth sending back. Very annoying especially when I paid more for the 50/50 because that's what I wanted and needed!
customer_reviews.author: sdeedeec

customer_reviews.title: Lid on container VERY difficult to remove
customer_reviews.text: The value for money is good. The lid on this container was literally fused shut and was impossible to remove. I had to get a box knife and cut off the spout. This may have been a one time incident, but it was definitely unacceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Kahler

customer_reviews.title: Good old green antifreeze
customer_reviews.text: If this type (green silica based) is what your manufacturer calls for, this is the type you should be using. Don't experiment unless you've got a chemistry degree and are willing to accept the consequences if your designer brand/type antifreeze causes problems in your cooling system.
customer_reviews.author: Mons Veneris

customer_reviews.title: The last of this kind !
customer_reviews.text: This is the correct coolant for every vehicle built before 1995. With the Government / EPA on the never ending warpath, this chemical days are numbered. But there isn't a replacement that does it's job so well as Zerex original Ethylene Glycol. This is perhaps not the best for the environment, but it is the best anti-freeze for many, many vehicles.
customer_reviews.author: J.T.Ward

customer_reviews.title: Happy husband=happy wife!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this at my husbands request and asked him for his review. He said “it’s get the job done”. Haha. He used it in a 1988 ford diesel tractor and will be purchasing it again when the time comes.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: works as good as any of the others out there
customer_reviews.text: cheap enough and its full strength, easy to mix with water when adding to radiator.
customer_reviews.author: THXkid

customer_reviews.title: AD says 50/50....Its not.Its full strth.You have  to use water
customer_reviews.text: The ad is incorrect.Claims 50/50...So you would think its 50/50..NO need for water...Am I right????Ty..You Need WATER..Just for your FYI..
customer_reviews.author: KERRI MACDOWELL

customer_reviews.title: 100 Percent Antifreeze/cooolant not the 50/50 stuff that screws you out of the 70/30 mix
customer_reviews.text: True green antifreeze/coolant Been using this product line for over 25 years now and have never had an issue. I run big trucks both long haul and local and Zerex has been the brand that has stood the test of time and temperature extremes
customer_reviews.author: UpwrdMblty

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: Worked just fine and was cheaper then auto parts store.
customer_reviews.author: ssbkc

customer_reviews.title: 100% anti-freeze. One gallon equals two whn properly diluted.
customer_reviews.text: Plain old fashioned anti-freeze (green) for older vehicles. It's much more economical to buy 100% anti-freeze and mix it yourself which makes two gallons.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. Hertel

customer_reviews.title: Lasts long enough and far enough for me.
customer_reviews.text: Green coolant is what my ‘95 Dodge Dakota has used, and, despite supposedly being “old tech”, this stuff says it’ll go 5 years or 100K miles, so that’s close enough to current “extended life” coolants for me.
customer_reviews.author: K. Hittner

customer_reviews.title: Quick shipping,good price not pre deluted
customer_reviews.text: Use this stuff in all my cars to protect cooling systems with aluminum heads and radiators
customer_reviews.author: Taildrager1949

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Classic Cars
customer_reviews.text: If you have a copper radiator, this is the fluid you need.
customer_reviews.author: Peer

customer_reviews.title: Best out there
customer_reviews.text: I love this coolant from now on this is all i use I've converted my dex cool only to the zerex low silicate and my cars have ran so much better
customer_reviews.author: Westates Recycling

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: if you need non corrosive coolant for foreign models ,this is a worthy product
customer_reviews.author: Alwayslooking

customer_reviews.title: When you need the green!
customer_reviews.text: when you need the original green coolant for a classic car - this could not be easier.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Good green full strength stuff
customer_reviews.text: Package well. Came in with no issues in a timely manner. Full strength as listed. Works well.
customer_reviews.author: JMar

customer_reviews.title: geat coolant does what it says it will do
customer_reviews.text: used this in my 2001 mercedes c class. I had a small leak so I kept this in the trunk and used it monthly. Works 100% fine with my car.
customer_reviews.author: R  Gerster

customer_reviews.title: It's the good 'ol stuff from when you were a kid
customer_reviews.text: It's the good 'ol stuff from when you were a kid. perfect for my 93 z28. It's what came in the car originally.
customer_reviews.author: fresh

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff!
customer_reviews.text: If you need the green stuff, this is the real deal! Using in '98 jeep Cherokee.
customer_reviews.author: Stan

customer_reviews.title: Good .
customer_reviews.text: Used in my early model cars & trucks . And its concentrated to get 2 gallons.
customer_reviews.author: Michele J.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The only anti-freeze to use on antique and classic cars.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel L. Marsh

customer_reviews.title: Hard to find
customer_reviews.text: Hard to find nowadays at local auto part stores. Great price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: THIS SHOULD NOT BE USED WITH VEHICLES NEWER THAN 1996 STATES THIS FACT ON CONTAINER,
customer_reviews.text: COULD NOT USE IN 2001 CADILLAC , NOT COMPATIBLE WITH CARS NEWER THAN 1996, JUST DID ANOTHER SEARCH WITH FIT CHECK, AND THIS IS STILL ONE OF THE OPTIONS.
customer_reviews.author: melvin h.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: perfect, needed old green for my 01 honda - this is the best coolant i ever got
customer_reviews.author: Dave Smith

customer_reviews.title: Quality stuff
customer_reviews.text: Great quality antifreeze, replaced GM OE junk with this. Very pleased with Zerex brand products.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy J.

customer_reviews.title: No hassle right part the first time
customer_reviews.text: Thank you fast delivery and right part the first time
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive when you mix it with dollar store distilled water!
customer_reviews.text: Worked excellent and was super cheap for my old sentra.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa Blenz

customer_reviews.title: Not All Makes/Models formula.
customer_reviews.text: For older vehicles only. Not an all makes/models formula. Had to return.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was excellent and I am happy to find this old stuff made fresh.
customer_reviews.author: BL

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great stuff, the ONLY brand to use when not buying OEM. Quality is good
customer_reviews.author: Mark R

customer_reviews.title: Quality Antifreeze
customer_reviews.text: This full strength green antifreeze. This is for older cars that take green coolant only. I used this for my 1980 Plymouth. When mixed properly with water, comes out to be about 8.25 a gallon mixed. A good buy!
customer_reviews.author: James F. Magowan

customer_reviews.title: The real green antifreeze
customer_reviews.text: To verify, yes this is the concentrate antifreeze. The product description is wrong and it is NOT 50/50 diluted. Otherwise, this is a good choice for cars that take green antifreeze. This will be going in a 1965 F-100 and an 1988 GMC Suburban.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Twain

customer_reviews.title: The Best!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the best antifreeze I have used. Good for 5 years or 100,000 miles. Mix with distilled water 50/50. Used this for years with no problems, just check the antifreeze requirements on your vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: Speedy J

customer_reviews.title: Zerex is all I use.
customer_reviews.text: I have always used Zerex but can not find it locally and had to order it on line. I have tried other products but was not happy with the products.
customer_reviews.author: Eli Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Coolant
customer_reviews.text: This is a pure coolant, not a 50/50 mix. I diluted it and put it in my new radiator and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Chase J. Lagasse

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: it worked as I replaced the intake gaskets on my 01 intrepid.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My car has been acting right since, I got this
customer_reviews.author: Gonorleathia R.

customer_reviews.title: 100% Ethylene Glycol
customer_reviews.text: This is the good stuff. Not pre-diluted. Just the good old green stuff. As an aside, this stuff is totally safe with all cooling systems, and in fact, BETTER than the pink/orange HOAT and OAT stuff. **However** you must totally flush the orange/pink stuff out of your cooling system before putting in the green, or else it'll congeal.
customer_reviews.author: turbo54

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: What can I say Zerex is Zerex it works like most antifreeze. Good shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby T.

customer_reviews.title: Zerez should be your next. If not you may just see me or another mech in the near future !!
customer_reviews.text: Nice thick Coolant. As it should be. Always use this over the 50/50 crap. That way I know what the mix I put in is and can trust it. As a professional Mechanic of better than 37 years I can say that a proper mix in your radiator should always be 80/20. That is 80 antifreeze and 20 water. Mosy people use straight water as it is easy. Until they blow their motor. Than the bill is devastating.
customer_reviews.author: Bob B.

customer_reviews.title: NOT ready to use
customer_reviews.text: Currently the amazon description says this is a 50/50 ready to use mixture. It is however the concentrate! 100% antifreeze so you'll have to mix it yourself!
customer_reviews.author: Ben

product_meta.title: Zerex Original Green Antifreeze/Coolant 1 GA
product_meta.description: Size:1 GA| Style:Original Green| Configuration:ConcentrateZEREX™ Original Green provides superior cooling system protection for passenger, light duty and heavy duty vehicles. Used for decades by many automakers worldwide, the formula provides excellent corrosion and freeze protection.
feature_bullets: Provides protection down to -34 degree fahrenheit
A patented organic acid corrosion inhibitor package to provide extended engine protection against rust and corrosion
Contains 30 – 50 ppm of denatonium benzoate as a bittering agent
